title: Magical mystery tour
creator_credit: Ringo Starr, Paul McCartney, John Lennon, Bernard Knowles, George Harrison and Beatles
brief_description: Join The Beatles on an hallucinatory mystery tour to the tunes of “Baby your a rich man”, “Penny lane”, “Flying”, “The Fool on the hill”, “All you need is love”, “Strawberry fields forever”, “Blue jay way”, “Hello goodbye”, “I am the walrus”, “Your mother should know”, and “All my loving”.
